KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumMatrix comparison functions 023
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the comparison functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note: The value of the first NumMatrix is greater than the value of the second NumMatrix.
The value of the first Matrix is lesser than the value of the second Matrix.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer an integer resulting from the comparison (0 for equal, -1 for less than, and 1 for greater than), use the compare function.
